newsitem.title: UK: Baltic Freight Index resumes advance, up six.
newsitem.headline: Baltic Freight Index resumes advance, up six.

text.p: The Baltic Freight Index (BFI) began the week with a fresh gain on Monday, of six points to 1,069, in a fairly quiet London freight market marked by stronger Panamax fixtures in the Pacific.
Theonymphos 66,713 dwt fixed delivery NoPac prompt trip Far East at $8,100 daily plus $200,000 bonus.
Atlantic Statesman 65,354 dwt fixed delivery Taiwan trip via Bunbury redelivery Jubail at $7,350 daily to Sanko.
Shipbrokers say the next few days may be crucial in determining short-term direction in the market. A key question was whether U.S. Gulf demand for Panamaxes would stay buoyant.
